subject: Do not overwrite global CFLAGS and LDFLAGS
commitMessage:
Do not overwrite global CFLAGS and LDFLAGS

Change-Id: Iac44318107cf34d8fd5e7dc0a16becbb6e74bbf0
Signed-off-by: Yury Usishchev <y.usishchev@samsung.com>

comments.message: Uploaded patch set 1.
Patch Set 1: Code-Review+2 Verified+1
Change has been successfully merged into the git repository.

Patch Set 1:

A SR (Submit Request) has been triggered to submit the commit to OBS Tizen:IVI:Panda project.
- Submitter: Chanho Park <chanho61.park@samsung.com>
- Comments: Use global CFLAGS
- Git project: platform/upstream/gnu-efi
- Tag: submit/tizen/20141224.012004
- Commit: 900b2668ee7a29631d1e3ddfa2916ccbca5f1ebe Do not overwrite global CFLAGS and LDFLAGS
- Request URL: https://build.tizen.org/request/show/31303

Patch Set 1:

The SR (Submit Request) has been *rejected* to OBS Tizen:IVI project.
- Reviewer: tizenrobot
- Comments: SR 31308 is set to declined state. Gummiboot build failed in prerelease:
[   65s] /usr/lib/libefi.a(print.o): In function `ValueToString:
[   65s] /home/abuild/rpmbuild/BUILD/gnu-efi-3.0/lib/print.c:1233: undefined reference to `__stack_chk_fail_local
[   65s] /usr/lib/libefi.a(print.o): In function `DumpHex:
[   65s] /home/abuild/rpmbuild/BUILD/gnu-efi-3.0/lib/print.c:1328: undefined reference to `__stack_chk_fail_local
[   65s] ld: src/efi/gummiboot.so: hidden symbol `__stack_chk_fail_local isnt defined
[   65s] ld: final link failed: Bad value
[   65s] nm: src/efi/gummiboot.so: No such file
[   65s]   GEN      gummibootia32.efi
[   65s] objcopy: src/efi/gummiboot.so: No such file
[   65s] make[1]: *** [gummibootia32.efi] Error 1
[   65s] make: *** [all] Error 2
[   65s] error: Bad exit status from /var/tmp/rpm-tmp.E1sY4I (%build)
- Git project: platform/upstream/gnu-efi
- Tag:submit/tizen/20141224.012004
- Request URL:https://build.tizen.org/request/show/31308

subject: resetting manifest requested domain to floor
commitMessage: resetting manifest requested domain to floor

comments.message:

[BUILD CHECK RESULT] This change is built against OBS project Tizen:

 standard       armv7hl        excluded

 standard       i586           succeeded
